content:
ProfessionalColors Class

Definition

Provides Color structures that are colors of a Windows display element. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public sealed class ProfessionalColors
Inheritance

ImageMarginGradientBegin

Gets the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a ToolStripDropDownMenu.

public static System.Drawing.Color ImageMarginGradientBegin { get; }
Value
Color

A Color that is the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a ToolStripDropDownMenu.

Remarks

ShowImageMargin must be set to true for this color to be displayed.
